name: Slate V2
details:
Slate is a reprogrammable stereo effect pedal. Like all of our stereo pedals, Slate can be programmed as any effect in Pedal Customizer software:
Wet™ Reverb
Chroma™ Chorus
Echelon™ Echo
Seraphim™ Shimmer
Infinity Hold (works only in buffered-bypass mode)
The footswitch behavior is also selectable (see the Advanced User Guide for details):
Tap Tempo for echo
Long-press for shimmer
Two-stage bypass for reverb
The Slate top surface may be written on with a Sharpie™-brand silver metallic marker, then erased with common 91% (or greater) isopropyl alcohol.
Features
Stereo or mono input and output
Three controls, function depending on effect
Access 4 programmable effects with 2 presets each via ExP accessory (sold separately)
Mix knob goes to 100% effect
Buffered trails bypass (optional true bypass available) with soft-switching
Very high input impedance: no "tone suck"
Analog dry signal for low noise and zero latency
Small footprint
Requires standard 9V or 12V pedal power supply (not included)
Made in Orange County, California USA
